roleset.name: compete in a race

example.name: Arg 3 as a type of race
example.text: a horse race between the U.S. and Japan

example.name: Example of arg 2 'goal'
example.text: it has won the race in Europe to introduce computers based on a powerful new microprocessor chip
example.arg: to introduce computers based on a powerful new microprocessor chip

roleset.note: Roleset based on race.02. Verbnet class run-51.3.2. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Example of arg 3
example.text: His participation in the house and senate race

example.name: Example of arg 1 and 2
example.text: The race for govenorship between the two candidates in Virginia continues.

roleset.name: group of people
roleset.note: Roleset based on eventive-nouns-00060. No corresponding verbnet class. Framed by Katie.

example.name: Example with only arg 2 (because arg 1 is outside of the scope)
example.text: The Amazons were a much feared race.
